price: 31. Mpe tokomeka bino mpo toyeba banani bazali kobunda (тропа Allah), тре banani bazali kokanga mitema, mpo ete na sima tomonisa basango na bino.
arabic: وَلَنَبۡلُوَنَّكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ نَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡمُجَٰهِدِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ وَنَبۡلُوَاْ أَخۡبَارَكُمۡ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
